*Drazom and Mantella wait sitting by the pod. They start to get bored and f=
licking sticks and with bugs* Drazom: I'd like to know more about you. Mant=
ella: Well, There's not much to know. *Drazom walks over and sits next to M=
antella* Drazom: Don't be shy. Mantella: No, really. I'm not being shy. It'=
s just...there was never anything that ever made since that went on in my l=
ife exept for the fact that I never had any friends, Everyone hated me, I n=
ever had a boyfriend and things are the same today. *Mantella turns toward =
Drazom and they stare into each others optics. They move closer to each oth=
er but before their lips can lock the stasis pod opens* *Mantella spins aro=
und and jumps to her feet ready to see the new bot but Drazom isn't as happ=
y* *Drazom stands up trying to pay attention to the pod but can't get his o=
ptics of Mantella* *Then a large Scorpion steps out of the pod* *Mantella w=
alks up to the new bot to greet her*
